scripts.dev: concurrently -n "REACT-WEB,BACKEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev --prefix react-web" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.dev-native: concurrently -n "REACT-NATIVE,BACKEND" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd react-native && expo start" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
